title: EmployerHistoryType
description: The prior and current details of a person's employment, work, or relevant experience such as might be reported within a professional profile, CV, resume, employment application, or similar document. Details of a particular tenure of employment or work with an organization.

PositionHistoryType.title: PositionHistoryType
PositionHistoryType.description: The details about a persons tenure within position.

title.description: The title that the person held for this position.

resourceRelationshipCode.description: The relationship of the person to the organization - an employee or an employee of another company (contract or temporary staffing).

organization.description: The department, sub-company, office, or other sub-organization to which the person was employed.

location.description: The location of the position to which the person was employed.

jobCategories.description: The job categories under which the position is classified. These may be international, national, industry, or company categories as defined by the entity owner.

jobLevels.description: The job levels under which this position is classified. These may be international, national, industry or company levels as defined by the entity owner.

organization.description: The specific organization to which the person held positions or performed work.

positionHistories.description: The set of positions that the person held at the organization.
